comments.author: Matt
comments.body: Dave Underwood and I are doing a duathlon of some sort. We are meeting at Humanities at 12:05. All others are, as always, welcome to join the fray.

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Great having Matt's company today. We managed to nail the pipe cut on Poorman w/out leaving any unsightly bloodstains. So nice being tidy. Thanks for joining me Matt!
